document_data.title: Trembling Village
document_data.realm year: The Year of Gathering Darkness ([[1371 DR]]){{LJ}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Trembling Village''''' is a tournament module set in ''Malatra – Living Jungle'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 2{{rd}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Living Jungle]]'' series of adventures published for the RPGA Network. It was intended for a group of low/mid level heroes.

{{Quote|''In this adventure the heroes must aid a village that is endangered by earthquakes. The village has lost many of its warriors, and without the heroes help, the inhabitants will not survive.''|}}
document_data.Summary: Terrible earthquakes began rumbling across the Living Jungles. [[Bengoukee]] saw them as a terrible sign of dark things to come. The village of [[Kaltra]] was ruined in the tremors and the [[Lake of Many Fish]] on which it stood became a mud pit. The heroes of the Living Jungle were sent on a 300-mile journey across the [[Malatran Plateau]] to find the refugees and escort them to safety of the [[Koshiva]] tribe village. The refugees faced attacks from [[deinonychus]], [[garuda dog]]s, and [[sailback]]s on the journey but eventually reached their new home.
